alert.note: Alert for Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 4:32PM CDT until March 26 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL WARREN AND NORTHWESTERN HINDS COUNTIES... At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bovina, or 8 miles east of Vicksburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. At 428 PM, quarter size hail was reported near Bovina. At 415 PM, a 54 mph wind gust was reported at the Vicksburg Municipal Airport. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Flowers around 435 PM CDT. Edwards and Youngton around 445 PM CDT. Bolton and Brownsville around 500 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
